review: This is a well crafted device.  Comes together nicely.  The dongle on my LG went bad and it was cheaper to buy the fire stick.  It fires-up Prime quickly.  However, it is very reluctant (as in rediculously slow) to link with Netflix.  Don't know if that is by intent--just seems odd that the one function that works best is its' own.

review: First of all let me clarify that I am not a techy person AT ALL. I am way behind the curve with all this online streaming and decided for the Fire Stick because all the other reviews ranked it best and because I got an amazing deal and only paid $4 for it. Also, I am a stay-at-home mom of a 7 year old and a 1 year old so I rarely watch TV. With that said, I have been catching up with all the trending TV shows and movies since I got it a week ago. The set up was easier that easy and so was learning how to work it. I downloaded the remote app on my phone so I can do voice search now too. My only problem has been figuring out a way to watch live TV (without a cable service).
author: daniela justiniano
